description: The PB_AUTO_PAY_HX table stores the history of auto pay status for a premium billing account.

columns.name: PB_ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AUTO_PAY_HX_ACT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the auto pay action performed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Enrolled


Canceled


Edited

columns.name: AUTO_PAY_HX_ACT_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the source of the auto pay action performed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Hyperspace


MyChart


Batch

columns.name: AUTO_PAY_HX_EDIT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
When a current auto pay setup is edited, this columns stores the thing that changed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Payment Method


Payment Day


Payment Day and Method

columns.name: AUTO_PAY_HX_MYPT_ID
columns.description: Stores the MyChart ID of the member if the auto pay action was performed from MyChart

columns.name: AUTO_PAY_HX_ACT_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date when a particular auto pay workflow was perfomed

columns.name: AUTO_PAY_HX_TERM_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reason as to why auto pay was terminated


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


User Canceled


Member Canceled


Payment Failed


No Current Coverages


Payment Method Expired
